availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Murphy (Pendleton County, Kentucky, master carpenter)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, master carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Murphy. Father of William T. Murphy, James D. Murphy, and John W. Murphy. Master carpenter in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 1.
Find A Grave, "James Murphy (1828-1897)," Memorial #55441946, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/55441946 (accessed June 4, 2018).
